title: C'mon, lets get real guys.
body:
Garen doesn't need a silence.

not gunna lie.

replies.body: Garen doesn't have any type of other crowd control (no slow, no stun, no snare etc..) so to balance it out rito obviously needs to give garen a silence
why not? its not like he has any other form of cc
hes had the same silence for like 5 years. this is league of garen, if garen wants to talk he will silence you, as he has always done so, and as he always  will
